text.more:
A graph displaying the data from the "Les Misérables" file we worked on in the exercise:

- The graph should use the Atlas Force algorithm.
- Node size should be mapped to the centrality between (indicating how central the node is).
- Node color should be mapped to modularity, which divides the nodes into groups.
- Edge thickness indicates the strength of the connection between entities.
- Edge color will be according to the modularity.
- The text size of the nodes will be according to the degree (number of neighboring nodes for each node).
